cz.odcleanstorage.prototype.virtuosoaccess
Class VirtuosoConnection

java.lang.Object
  cz.odcleanstorage.prototype.virtuosoaccess.VirtuosoConnection

public class VirtuosoConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates jdbc connections and single threaded basic data operations on Virtuoso database.

Author:
Petr Jerman (petr.jerman@centrum.cz)
